General.Name: Beijing Oriental Yuhong Waterproof Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Oriental Yuhong Waterproof Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in research and development, production, and sale of waterproof materials primarily in China. The company offers bituminous and self-adhesive waterproof membranes, waterproof coatings, as well as rigid waterproof, system supporting, and sealing materials. It also engages in waterproof engineering, civil construction materials, energy saving and heat preservation materials, non-woven fabric, architectural coatings, specialized mortar, building coating materials, building renovation, specialized films, and other businesses. The company's waterproofing solutions are used in buildings, highways, metros, urban railways, high-speed railways, urban roads and bridges, airports, water conservancy facilities, and underground pipelines. It sells its products through home improvement companies, building materials supermarkets and market dealers, and e-commerce multiple integrated marketing network. It operates in China, Hong Kong, Macau, and internationally. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Beijing, China.
